metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4235 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Due to unbounded alias chasing, a maliciously crafted YAML file can cause the system to consume significant system resources. If parsing user input, this may be used as a denial of service vector.

notes.Note: leosilva> kubernates is in fact a kubernetes installer that calls snap, not the package it self.

criterions.comment: golang-yaml.v2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
singularity-container: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
webhook: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
